verses.verse: <S%H1945>Ho<s%>, every one that <S%H6771>thirsteth<s%>, <S%H3212>come<s%> ye to the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and he that hath no <S%H3701>money<s%>; <S%H3212>come<s%> ye, <S%H7666>buy<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%>; yea, <S%H3212>come<s%>, <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> and <S%H2461>milk<s%> without <S%H3701>money<s%> and without <S%H4242>price<s%>.

Wherefore do ye <S%H8254>spend<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> for that which is not <S%H3899>bread<s%>? and your <S%H3018>labour<s%> for that which <S%H7654>satisfieth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%>? <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H8085>diligently<s%> unto me, and <S%H398>eat<s%> ye that which is <S%H2896>good<s%>, and let your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6026>delight<s%> itself in <S%H1880>fatness<s%>. spend: Heb. weigh

<S%H5186>Incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%>, and <S%H3212>come<s%> unto me: <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and your <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%>; and I will <S%H3772>make<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you, even the <S%H539>sure<s%> <S%H2617>mercies<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>.
Behold, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> him for a <S%H5707>witness<s%> to the <S%H3816>people<s%>, a <S%H5057>leader<s%> and <S%H6680>commander<s%> to the <S%H3816>people<s%>.

Behold, thou shalt <S%H7121>call<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> not, and <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H3045>knew<s%> not thee shall <S%H7323>run<s%> unto thee because of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and for the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; for he hath <S%H6286>glorified<s%> thee.
<S%H1875>Seek<s%> ye the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> while he may be <S%H4672>found<s%>, <S%H7121>call<s%> ye upon him while he is <S%H7138>near<s%>:

Let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>, and the <S%H205>unrighteous<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4284>thoughts<s%>: and let him <S%H7725>return<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and he will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon him; and to our <S%H430>God<s%>, for he will <S%H7235>abundantly<s%> <S%H5545>pardon<s%>. the unrighteous: Heb. the man of iniquity abundantly: Heb. multiply to pardon
For my <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are not your <S%H4284>thoughts<s%>, neither are your <S%H1870>ways<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

For as the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H1361>higher<s%> than the <S%H776>earth<s%>, so are my <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H1361>higher<s%> than your <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and my <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> than your <S%H4284>thoughts<s%>.

For as the <S%H1653>rain<s%> cometh <S%H3381>down<s%>, and the <S%H7950>snow<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H7725>returneth<s%> not thither, but <S%H7301>watereth<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and maketh it bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> and <S%H6779>bud<s%>, that it may <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> to the <S%H2232>sower<s%>, and <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H398>eater<s%>:

So shall my <S%H1697>word<s%> be that goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: it shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> unto me <S%H7387>void<s%>, but it shall <S%H6213>accomplish<s%> that which I <S%H2654>please<s%>, and it shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in the thing whereto I <S%H7971>sent<s%> it.

For ye shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> with <S%H8057>joy<s%>, and be led <S%H2986>forth<s%> with <S%H7965>peace<s%>: the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> shall break <S%H6476>forth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you into <S%H7440>singing<s%>, and all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H4222>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands<s%>.

Instead of the <S%H5285>thorn<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> the fir <S%H1265>tree<s%>, and instead of the <S%H5636>brier<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> the myrtle <S%H1918>tree<s%>: and it shall be to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for a <S%H8034>name<s%>, for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H226>sign<s%> that shall not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.
